title: How To Mark 10 Years Of Co-Hosting 'Morning Edition'? Take A Break!
teaser: Renee Montagne says so long for now. This is the 10th year that she and Steve Inskeep have hosted the show together, and she says she's celebrating by taking a very long (three-month) vacation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
